title: CEO Statement on Current Operations
itunes:title: CEO Statement on Current Operations
itunes:subtitle: And now a statement from Rusty Quill CEO, Alexander J Newall with some updates on the current state of operations at Rusty Towers, as of 25th March 2020.
description:
And now a statement from Rusty Quill CEO, Alexander J Newall with some updates on the current state of operations at Rusty Towers, as of 25th March 2020.


For a full transcript of this statement, visit http://rustyquill.com/ceo-statement-on-covid-19/


Join our community:

WEBSITE: rustyquill.com

FACEBOOK: facebook.com/therustyquill

TWITTER: @therustyquill

REDDIT: reddit.com/r/RustyQuill

EMAIL: mail@rustyquill.com

Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
